name: playbuddy-api
description: Node.js app with TypeScript for Cloud Run

scripts.script:doSchedule: npx tsx ./src/scripts/doSchedule/index.ts --main 'https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/e/2PACX-1vRae3avNWRn85A4Ox3WCjcQiLsOYDMLfalQ38FychB5fYCH50UVcYqgImm2pxyu0N0sRkP_oYJsmDmF/pub?gid=1774091174&single=true&output=csv' --workshops 'https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/e/2PACX-1vRae3avNWRn85A4Ox3WCjcQiLsOYDMLfalQ38FychB5fYCH50UVcYqgImm2pxyu0N0sRkP_oYJsmDmF/pub?gid=928344789&single=true&output=csv' --ion 'https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/e/2PACX-1vRae3avNWRn85A4Ox3WCjcQiLsOYDMLfalQ38FychB5fYCH50UVcYqgImm2pxyu0N0sRkP_oYJsmDmF/pub?gid=41278806&single=true&output=csv' --year 2025 --month 8 --tz America/New_York --jsonOut ../playbuddy-web/public/misc/do_summer_camp_2025.json --icsOut ../playbuddy-web/public/misc/do_summer_camp_2025.ics --fuzzyThreshold 0.4 --debugFuzzy && cd ../playbuddy-web && npm run deploy
scripts.sentry:sourcemaps: SENTRY_RELEASE=${SENTRY_RELEASE:-${CI_COMMIT_SHA:-}}; if [ -z "$SENTRY_RELEASE" ] && command -v git >/dev/null 2>&1; then SENTRY_RELEASE=$(git rev-parse --short HEAD); fi; if [ -z "$SENTRY_RELEASE" ]; then SENTRY_RELEASE=$(date +%Y%m%d%H%M%S); fi; echo "Using Sentry release $SENTRY_RELEASE"; sentry-cli sourcemaps inject --org toli-z2 --project node --release "$SENTRY_RELEASE" ./dist && sentry-cli sourcemaps upload --org toli-z2 --project node --release "$SENTRY_RELEASE" ./dist
